report.title: Not a Waste of Time but Won't Do It Again
report.author: Anonymous
report.bodytext: * Summary: I'm glad that I did it and I'm glad that its over and I am happy that I dont have to do it again. /n /n Positive effects: /n + Time seem to slow down [quite alot] so perception seem better and higher. /n + Extreme sharpness and alert of all bodily senses, things feel like they did when you were a kid - [colors/feelings/time/texture/experience]. /n /n Negative: /n -- intellectually disappointing, and boring [some benefits were made]. /n -- strong nausea and sickness especially for the VERY long first two hours. /n - pains in the lower body and internal organs [which I dont have normally]. /n - generally uncomfortable throughout the expeirence both mentally and physically. /n - some body load /n /n 12:00 T+0: not white-grey powder 40-55 mg 2c-c down the hatch after being dissolved in water. /n /n It was building up for two hours, two very nausiating hours. /n /n And I felt terrible, not from the nausea alone, but from the aching effects it had on my lower body and internal organs [pains I dont have normally]. [Obviously the body doesnt like this substance, which might explain why people wake up somewhat happy the day after, that its mostly out of their system ...] /n /n T+2: starts to settle, nausea subsides a bit, but some of it is stayed throughout. [nothing was eaten for some hours before the ingestion] /n /n Vividing of colors and sounds is appreciated. Existance slows down and is waiting for me to establish a connection. Strong stimulative effects and lack of intellectual properties and personal preparation denies me that. /n /n T+4.5: Byebye colors and sharpness and minimal mental experience and time distortion. Stimulant aspects disappointingly remains. /n /n T+6.5: Almost all gone STIMUALNT is still here. Hard to concentrate and remember. /n /n Note: various herbal teas [camomile, green tea, etc.] helped reduce nausea, but was not taken only after two hours. /n /n At the 3rd the refregerator was open and VARIOUS VERY COLORFUL AND VIVID vegtables were taken out, cut to a fullscale sensory salad. /n /n A short walk in the open outdoor gave a spectacular view of greens and blues and reds and whites. Some strange happyness and reassurance was there, some things were easier to grasp and understand, others not at all. /n /n -- /n I wouldnt recommend this substance to anyone at any state, unless there are no other possibilities in the universe available. /n /n For me, the best thing mind-alterants can benefit is intellectual property: /n 1) that I change things in my life *AND MYSELF* to a positive direction and avoid negative paths. /n 2) that I may better understand who what where why etc. /n 3) stop from the flood of day-to-day confusions aka. 'Normal' modern life, and the ability to concentrate on what is right and benefitial. /n /n And maybe the occasional tranquility and euphoria from our ever-angry surroundings but for me its not the major issue. If it doesnt give this, or if I can achieve it in other ways I would not take it or any other.
